name: Thing-in-Itself
description: “Thing-in-Itself” is an interactive short story about the struggles of understanding another human being. Using Immanuel Kant’s concept as a framework, it leads the player through stages of a relationship, exploring how perceptions may clash and surroundings can alter.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Dual Core 2.1Ghz or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Video card with 512MB of VRAM or higher Storage: 700 MB available space Additional Notes: Display resolution above or equal 1280x720
